name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D CONCERT】Takanashi Kiara End Of The Year ⧸ Birthday Live 2023 小鳥遊キアラ生誕祭2023 #KFParty2023 [5LNv7CzFJgc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Takanashi Kiara and Pavolia Reine continue their performance of 'Villain'.
A transition interlude with stage effects as the next guest prepares.
Takanashi Kiara and Natsuiro Matsuri perform 'RoboKiss'.

subtitles.english: ...when you look at me, who do you remember?

subtitles.original: ロボキッス / 唄 / 小鳥遊キアラ 夏色まつり
subtitles.english: RoboKiss / Sung by Takanashi Kiara & Natsuiro Matsuri

subtitles.original: Lyrics / Composition: つんく
subtitles.english: Lyrics / Composition: Tsunku

subtitles.original: お熱い仲とはここのこと
subtitles.english: The two of us are so hot together

subtitles.original: 可愛いいあいつは分け前さ
subtitles.english: That cute person is my share

subtitles.original: 誰も彼もが平凡だダメダメ
subtitles.english: Everyone else is so ordinary, no good

subtitles.original: どこに投げたの運の目
subtitles.english: Where did you throw the lucky dice?

subtitles.original: デートの誘い合言葉
subtitles.english: The password for a date invitation

subtitles.original: 穴が開いてる伝説まだまだ
subtitles.english: The legend still has holes in it

subtitles.original: 恋くらい
subtitles.english: At least some love

subtitles.original: させてよ当然
subtitles.english: Let me have it, of course

subtitles.english: Please give me like-like-like-like

subtitles.english: Like-like-like-like is infinite

subtitles.original: スキスキスキスキはわかるわ
subtitles.english: I understand like-like-like-like

subtitles.original: スキスキスキスキロボどなたさま

subtitles.english: Robo-robo

subtitles.english: With this, it's friendship with him

subtitles.original: それじゃ彼氏と不平等
subtitles.english: Then it's unequal with a boyfriend

subtitles.english: What kind of logic is that? Studying is no good

subtitles.english: Even if it's calculated, I'm flustered

subtitles.original: 誰も承知でへっちゃら
subtitles.english: Everyone knows and doesn't care

subtitles.english: The destination of love is just gratefully accepted

subtitles.original: いつまでも

subtitles.original: 子供じゃないのね
subtitles.english: We're not children anymore
